attributes.action: Drastically reduce or strip the HSE of its powers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Health and Safety Executive is rapidly becoming a laughing stock with its idiotic rules and regulations all adding to the "nanny state" it should stick to monitoring Factories, Buiding Sites etc.
enough is enough

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
